designSystem.name: React Bits - Dark Gradient Portfolio
designSystem.description: Design system extracted from React Bits website with integrated hero-header pattern

doNot: DO NOT apply gradients to icon fills - icons are solid colors only
DO NOT apply card background gradients to card content - content uses solid colors
DO NOT create separate header background - header is transparent within hero
DO NOT use gradients on button backgrounds - buttons use solid colors with shadows
DO NOT apply text gradients to all text - only specific hero title portions
DO NOT put backdrop blur on header - header is fully transparent
DO NOT separate header from hero - they are integrated as one component
DO NOT use multiple quotes from stat cards - they use solid gradient text
DO NOT apply floating shape gradients to UI elements - they are background only
DO NOT use green color for primary elements - green is only for success badges
alwaysDo: ALWAYS position header absolutely within hero section
ALWAYS use backdrop blur on navigation pill container, not header
ALWAYS apply text gradient using background-clip: text
ALWAYS use semi-transparent backgrounds for glass-morphism effects
ALWAYS maintain contrast ratios for accessibility
ALWAYS use solid colors for icons, never gradients
ALWAYS apply shadows to buttons and cards on appropriate states
ALWAYS keep floating shapes heavily blurred (80px+)
ALWAYS use radial gradients for background glows, linear for shapes
ALWAYS maintain consistent border radius across similar components
